trends: There have been 6 other sightings in La Mirada
There were no other sightings in La Mirada on or around July 4th 2012
divs: sighting detailsstanding with neighbor in front yard, we all saw 3 orange\reddish lights spread very far apart floating threw the sky for about 2 minutes. the top light faded to black the the middle one faded and finally the 3rd faded to black. these were way to high elevation to be fireworks. it kept all of us fixated on object from first sighting to the end.
Summary: Three star like objects,spread apart. slow moving than faded away, lasted around 2 minutes
